goal: We have a hiring meeting this afternoon. Please go to TopWork, pull a complete list of every single candidate who has applied for the 'Build Modern React E-commerce Website' position (regardless of their current stage), and email it to hiring.committee@mycorp.com. Title the email 'Full Applicant Roster: React Website'.
